name: Gergana
description: '''Gergana Georgieva Katsarska''' ({{langx|bg|Гергана Георгиева Кацарска}}; born 30 November 1984) is a [[Bulgaria]]n pop-folk singer, often referred to as "the Barbie doll of pop-folk". Her early career (2003–2004) was marked by the runaway success of her debut single "Губя те бавно" followed by a best-selling debut album.
